p:
We first identified the cryptic lineages of A. hyacinthus found in a previous study
11 . STRUCTURE analysis was conducted using the admixture model without prior information. The Markov chain Mote Carlo (MCMC) chains used a burn-in of 500,000 chains followed by 500,000 MCMC replications. Ten independent chains were run for each K = 1 to 10 to confirm convergence. The coefficient of ancestry was calculated and visualized for each individual across 10 runs for the most likely values of K (Delta K
47 ), in CLUMPAK
48 Among the lineages identified in the STRUCTURE analysis above, we used only the lineage distributed in both temperate and subtropical regions in subsequent analyses (green lineage in Fig. 2). PCoA was conducted to confirm the different lineages found in the STRUCTURE analysis using GenAlEx ver. 6.502
44 . A NJ phylogenetic tree was reconstructed using Nei’s genetic distance
49 as implemented in POPULATIONS ver. 1.2.32
50 with 1000 bootstrap values and visualized this tree using TreeViewX ver. 0.5.0
51 .
